dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for fotoconnection.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 13, 2006 7:53 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for fotoconnection.com



The Planet,

 

Thanks you for your attention to this matter.  We have rechecked
www.fotoconnection.com <http://www.fotoconnection.com/>  website, and we
are showing they are still infringing on Onkyo's creative text.
Creative text is a description written about a product in order to
support the sale of a product.  

We are requesting that you remove all creative marketing text.  Once
this is complete please notify me so I can recheck the website and if in
compliance I will close the case.

 

 

http://www.fotoconnection.com/vi-22981________Onkyo-TX-SR603X-90-.html

 

 

http://www.fotoconnection.com/vi-23340________Onkyo-TX-SR803-S-Silver-.h
tml

 

 

http://www.fotoconnection.com/vi-23426________Onkyo-TX-SR703B-7-1-.html

 

 

http://www.fotoconnection.com/vi-23540________Onkyo-HT-S680B-6-1-.html

 

 

Thank you,

 

 

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com 

compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

 

 

-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: Tuesday, December 12, 2006 3:38 PM
To: Barbara Davis; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for fotoconnection.com

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

 

Legal Response Team

The Planet

 

 

 

---------

 

 

From: Barbara Davis

[mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com]

Sent: Friday, December 08, 2006 12:27 PM

To:

Legal Response

Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for fotoconnection.com

 

To

Whom It May Concern:

 

Thank you for removing all of Onkyo logos and copyrighted

images from the urls provided, but in order to comply fully all of the

copyrighted images and/or trademarked logos of Onkyo needs to be removed
from

your entire website. This case concerning www.fotoconnection.com and
Onkyo will

remain open until this request is satisfied in full. If you should need
any

further assistance in reaching compliance please let me know and I will
do my

best to provide you with the needed information. Below you will find the

remaining infringing

URL's.

 

http://fotoconnection.com/vi-22981________Onkyo-TX-SR603X-90-.html

 

http

://fotoconnection.com/vi-23340________Onkyo-TX-SR803-S-Silver-.html

 

http://foto

connection.com/vi-23426________Onkyo-TX-SR703B-7-1-.html

 

http://fotoconnection.

com/vi-23540________Onkyo-HT-S680B-6-1-.html

 

 

Thank you for your attention to

this matter,

 

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers

Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com

compliance.management@netenforcers.com

 

The Online

Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this

e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are intended
solely for

the addressee. The information may also be legally privileged. This

transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the
intended

recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, any use,

reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is strictly
prohibited. If

you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender
by

reply e-mail and delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank
you.
